Hi :)
Assume the case where someone abuses group PMs in order to message a lot of people. Now, people want to get out of this group PM. Is there any good way to get them out?
Hmm, I don't think so. The expectation would probably just be that the organization adminitrators should deactivate the spammer, which would solve the problem

Hm, yeah that's reasonable :)
Maybe a possibility to leave group PMs might be worth considering, however :thinking: (independently of this specific problem...) It's not that important, tho
